item.description:
Toni Lynn, "the Queen", is an unbelievable singer with a wide-ranging repertoire. Although known for her blues singing, she can also really swing. And backed up by her top-notch band, including Mike DiBari on guitar, it promises to be a swinging night.

Come early for lessons.

 

At the Armenian Cultural Center in Watertown.

 

Lessons start at 7:45.   Music starts at 8:30.

 

Cover charge - $15 for the whole evening.
item.how_to_find_us: LEt's gather to the right of the stage, near the front of the room - look for me, I"ll look for you.
item.name: Swing dance to Toni Lynn Washington, Queen of the Blues
